About this site

    This site was created using following technologies:
  • 1. Grunt

    To structure and build the project I used Grunt and Bower tools. I utilized grunt watch, sass, connect, and uglify modules.

  • 2. Require, Backbone Layout Manager, and Underscore

    This website is implemented as a Single Page Application.
    Javascript files are structured as modules and html is rendered based on underscore templates. Data is provided to the page as a an array of json objects.

  • 2. Sass

    For styling and visual effects I used Sass preprocessor. I created multiple sass mixin functions that I repeatedly used to implement animations and transitions.

  • 3. Font Awesome Library
